analyzed: duvidhaḥ kusala upi a kusala upi
corrected: Māno pi duvidho kusalo pi akusalo pi

original: pihā, pihāpaccayā domanassaṁ, ayaṁ taṇhā kusalā rāgavirāgā cetovimutti, tadārammaṇā
analyzed: pihā pihā paccayā taṇhā kusalā rāga virāgā cetaḥ vimutti tad ārammaṇā
corrected: pihā pihā paccayā domanassaṁ ayaṁ taṇhā kusalā rāga virāgā cetaḥ vimutti tad ārammaṇā

original: yato vigatūpakkilesaṁ, tato mudu, yato mudu, tato kammaniyaṁ, yato kammaniyaṁ, tato
analyzed: tatas mudu yatas mudu tatas kammaniya yatas kammaniya tatas
corrected: yatas vigata upakkilesa tatas mudu yatas mudu tatas kammaniya yatas kammaniya tatas

original: Tattha yo ca pītipharaṇo yo ca sukhapharaṇo yo ca cetopharaṇo, ayaṁ samatho.
analyzed: tattha yaḥ ca pīti pharaṇaḥ yaḥ ca sukha pharaṇaḥ yaḥ ca cetaḥ pharaṇaḥ ayam
corrected: tattha yo ca pīti pharaṇo yo ca sukha pharaṇo yo ca ceto pharaṇo ayam samatho

original: Aññataro samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā kuhako lapako nemittako kuhanalapananemittakattaṁ
analyzed: aññataraḥ samaṇaḥ vā brāhmaṇaḥ vā kuhakaḥ lapakaḥ nemittakaḥ
corrected: aññataraḥ samaṇaḥ vā brāhmaṇaḥ vā kuhakaḥ lapakaḥ nemittakaḥ kuhanalapananemittakattaṁ

original: Maraṇantaṁ hi jīvitanti khayā āyussa indriyānaṁ uparodhā jīvitapariyanto maraṇapariyanto.
analyzed: hi khayā āyussaḥ indriyānaṃ uparodhā jīvita pariyantaḥ maraṇa pariyantaḥ
corrected: Maraṇantaṃ hi jīvitanti khayā āyussa indriyānaṃ uparodhā jīvita pariyanto maraṇa pariyanto

original: Apare ca maggaṁ bhāvetvā, parinibbantināsavāti sabbasaṅkhārānaṁ samatikkamanaṁ.
analyzed: apare ca maggam bhāvetvā sabba saṅkhārānam
corrected: apare ca maggam bhāvetvā parinibbanti anāsavā ti sabba saṅkhārānam samatikkamanam

original: “Apare ca maggaṁ bhāvetvā, parinibbantināsavā”ti majjhimā paṭipadā.
analyzed: apare ca maggam bhāvetvā majjhimā paṭipadā
corrected: apare ca maggam bhāvetvā parinibbantināsavā ti majjhimā paṭipadā

original: “Apare ca maggaṁ bhāvetvā, parinibbantināsavā”ti tiṇṇaṁ vaṭṭānaṁ vivaṭṭanā.
analyzed: apare ca maggam bhāvetvā tiṇṇam vaṭṭānam vivaṭṭanā
corrected: apare ca maggam bhāvetvā parinibbantināsavā ti tiṇṇam vaṭṭānam vivaṭṭanā

original: Apare ca maggaṁ bhāvetvā, parinibbantināsavāti idaṁ vodānaṁ.
analyzed: apare ca maggam bhāvetvā idam vodāna
corrected: apare ca maggam bhāvetvā parinibbantināsavāti idam vodānam

original: “apare ca maggaṁ bhāvetvā, parinibbantināsavā”ti puññapāpasamatikkamappaṭipadā, tattha
analyzed: apare ca maggam bhāvetvā puñña pāpa samatikkama paṭipadā tattha
corrected: apare ca maggam bhāvetvā parinibbanti anāsavā ti puñña pāpa samatikkama paṭipadā tattha

original: micchattaniyato rāsi, sammattaniyato rāsi, aniyato rāsi, tattha yo ca micchattaniyato
analyzed: rāsi sammat ta niyataḥ rāsi aniyataḥ rāsi tattha yaḥ ca micchatta niyato
corrected: micchatta niyato rāsi sammatta niyato rāsi aniyato rāsi tattha yo ca micchatta niyato

original: parasattānaṁ parapuggalānaṁ indriyaparopariyattavemattatā ñāṇaṁ sattamaṁ tathāgatabalaṁ.
analyzed: para sattānam para puggalānam ñāṇam sattamam tathāgata bala
corrected: para sattānam para puggalānam indriya paropariyatta vemattatā ñāṇam sattamam tathāgata balam
